alert.note: Alert for Carson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 01 at 7:59PM CDT until May 02 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for Poor Drainage Areas for... Northwestern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 758 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding in the advisory area. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Borger, Fritch, Stinnett and Sanford.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.
